g.text: Creating a pacs.008 financial message on the server side
Payload generation on the server side
Sends a pacs.008 financial message in base64 encoding for signing
Gets a signed pacs.008 financial message
Payload generation on the server side
Sends a query to extract the Payment Request
with the “payment” argument in the query parameters
Performs identification of the Payer and the ultimate Beneficiary
Compliance requirements (KYC/AML) on the server side
Performs identification of the bank details of the ultimate Beneficiary
Checks bank details on the server side
Gets account address for the operating account
with the "operating account identifier" parameter in the query parameters
Creating a issd.001 financial message on the server side
Payload generation on the server side
Sends a issd.001 financial message in base64 encoding for signing
Gets a signed issd.001 financial message
Payload generation on the server side
Creates and sends a transaction to the network
Extracts the operating account address of the Member’s SFI and the BFI
Generates a transaction based on pacs.008 and issd.001 information
Signed transaction by the SFI secret key
Signing a transaction by the IsSettled central account
Transaction Identifier in the Distributed Ledger
Executes customer credit transfer of funds
Delivery of funds to the disposal of the ultimate Beneficiary
Sends a query to extract a response to the Payment Request
with the “payment” argument in the query parameters
